snippet: A unit of the Swiss bank is under scrutiny following allegations that it designed investments for clients that were designed to evade taxes.
lead_paragraph: A unit of the Swiss bank is under scrutiny following allegations that it designed investments for clients that were designed to evade taxes.

headline.main: France Puts UBS Under Investigation for Aiding Tax Evasion
headline.print_headline: France Starts Formal Inquiry Of UBS Unit On Tax Shelters
